#summary Installation instructions
#labels Phase-Deploy

=Ubuntu=

_Installation of php-gtk_

Running under php-gtk, and because it's not in the official repositories, download and install [http://phpserenamer.googlecode.com/files/php5-gtk2_2.0.1-1_i386.deb this] first.

_Two installations systems_

You can either install directly from the debian package or configure your sources to use the PPA (Personal Package Archives), this will allow you to have automatic updates.

==From debian packages==

Then download [http://phpserenamer.googlecode.com/files/phpserenamer_0.1.0-rc1_all.deb this] to install phpserenamer.

==From PPA==

Add to lignes to the sources.list 
(or system -> admninistration -> sources -> third party softwares -> add):
{{{
deb http://ppa.launchpad.net/adriengallou/ppa-phpserenamer/ubuntu jaunty main
deb-src http://ppa.launchpad.net/adriengallou/ppa-phpserenamer/ubuntu jaunty main
}}}

Add the key to the list of acceptables keys :
{{{
sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 46B20A27
}}}

Update list of availlable packages :
{{{
sudo apt-get update
}}}

phpserenamer will be available with :
{{{
sudo apt-get install phpserenamer
}}}
and the updates will be proposed automaticly.

=Windows=

You don't need to install php-gtk, it will be automaticly install with phpserenamer.

Download [http://phpserenamer.googlecode.com/files/phpserenamer-0.1.0-r37.exe this] then follow the installation instructions.
